meanings.definition: Not dialectical; lacking in dialectical reasoning or approach.
meanings.sent1: Her undialectical thinking led to misunderstandings in the debate.
meanings.sent2: The undialectical response failed to address the complexity of the issue.
meanings.sent3: It was undialectical of him to ignore the opposing viewpoints completely.
meanings.sent4: His undialectical approach was like trying to solve a puzzle without all the pieces.
meanings.sent5: The undialectical nature of his argument made it hard to follow.
